solution_line_template: We know Kevin bought a ticket and drinks, and this cost him {kevin_ticket_cost} + {kevin_drinks_cost} = <<{kevin_ticket_cost}+{kevin_drinks_cost}={kevin_known_expenses}>>{kevin_known_expenses} dollars.

Since Kevin spent his entire budget, his food must have cost {kevin_total_budget} - {kevin_known_expenses} = <<{kevin_total_budget}-{kevin_known_expenses}={kevin_food_cost}>>{kevin_food_cost} dollars.
